overview:
Michael Monheim has held the role of Vice President at Axel Springer Group USA since 2001. Axel Springer Group Inc. NYC, is the largest marketer of European media in North America. ASG’s portfolio consists of Axel Springer (240 print titles & 140 websites), SevenOne Media (Europe’s 2nd largest TV group), auFeminin (Europe’s largest women’s portal), and France Television Publicite International.

Monheim established ASG Inc. as a gateway between Europe and US for cross media and multi-country initiatives in print, digital & TV. He has developed a key strategic network of contacts with top-level decision makers at international agency networks and companies.

Monheim is an active member of various committees and boards: Executive Steering Supervisory Board (largest German companies in US), IAA (International Advertising Association), AAF (American Advertising Federation) Newspapers Association of America (NAA), Magazine Publishers Association (MPA) since 2001. Close ties to German diplomatic community.
